Scale the sketch by a factor of 0.03. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D using the given euler angles [-90, 0, -90] and translation vector [0.15, 0.135, 0.285]. Extrude the 3D model with the following properties: * extrude\\_depth\\_towards\\_normal: 0.15 * extrude\\_depth\\_opposite\\_normal: 0.15 * sketch\\_scale: 0.03 * Perform a 'Cut Feature Operation' to finalize the second part. Final Shape Details: * Shape: A cylindrical object with a tapered end, resembling a metallic tube. * Length: 0.3 * Width: 0.03 * Height: 0.03</description>
